channel.title: Semiconductor Industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Semiconductor Industry on FinanClub

item.title: 1103 ON
item.description: score:1103 Chances: ON Semiconductor exceeded expectations in its second-quarter 2023 results, driven by strong sales of chips for automotive and industrial applications. The company’s business transformation efforts led to profitable growth, with $100 million in business closeouts in Q2 2023 and $400 million since 2021.

item.title: 0860 MU
item.description: score:860 Chances: Micron Technology saw a positive improvement to its Relative Strength (RS) Rating, indicating potential growth. The memory industry is expected to benefit from the growing proliferation of artificial intelligence (AI), creating huge demand for storage and compute solutions, which may positively impact Micron Technology’s business.
